```css
  border: 1px solid #DDD;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: #666;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  background: white;
}

.social-icons-row a:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

/* Accessibility Icons */
.accessibility-icons {
  display: flex;
  gap: 8px;
}

.accessibility-icons button {
  width: 36px;
  height: 36px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 1px solid #DDD;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: #666;
  background: white;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}

.accessibility-icons button:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.accessibility-icons button svg {
  stroke: currentColor;
}

.mt-3 {
  margin-top: 16px;
}

/* Copyright Bar V2 */
.footer-copyright-v2 {
  background-color: #F0F0F0;
  padding: 16px 0;
  border-top: 1px solid #E0E0E0;
}

.footer-copyright-v2 .footer-container {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 16px;
}

.copyright-links {
  display: flex;
  gap: 12px;
  align-items: center;
}

.copyright-links a {
  color: #666;
  font-size: 13px;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: color 0.2s;
}

.copyright-links a:hover {
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.copyright-links span {
  color: #CCC;
}

.footer-copyright-v2 .copyright-text {
  color: #666;
  font-size: 13px;
}

.nic-logo {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
  color: #666;
  font-size: 12px;
}

.nic-logo img {
  height: 28px;
  width: auto;
}

.footer-bottom-links a {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6);
  font-size: 13px;
  transition: color 0.2s;
}

.footer-bottom-links a:hover {
  color: white;
}

/* ========================================
   MAIN CONTENT
   ======================================== */
.main {
  min-height: calc(100vh - 200px);
}

/* Container class for auto margin on different screens */
.container {
  max-width: 1400px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 24px;
  width: 100%;
}

@media (max-width: 1200px) {
  .container {
    max-width: 1100px;
    padding: 0 20px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 992px) {
  .container {
    max-width: 900px;
    padding: 0 16px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .container {
    max-width: 100%;
    padding: 0 12px;
  }
}

/* ========================================
   PAGE HEADER
   ======================================== */
.page-header {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary) 0%, var(--color-primary-dark) 100%);
  padding: 48px 0;
  text-align: center;
}

.page-header h1 {
  color: white;
  font-size: 32px;
  font-weight: 700;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 12px;
}

.page-header h1 svg {
  color: white;
}

.page-header p {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  font-size: 16px;
  margin-top: 12px;
}

/* ========================================
   STEPPER
   ======================================== */
.stepper {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0;
  padding: 24px 20px;
  background: white;
  border-radius: var(--border-radius-lg);
  margin: -30px auto 32px;
  max-width: 900px;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow);
  position: relative;
  z-index: 10;
}

.step {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  flex: 1;
  position: relative;
}

[dir="rtl"] .step:not(:last-child)::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  left: -50%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 2px;
  background-color: var(--color-border);
  z-index: -1;
}

[dir="ltr"] .step:not(:first-child)::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  right: 50%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 2px;
  background-color: var(--color-border);
  z-index: -1;
}

.step.completed:not(:last-child)::before,
.step.active:not(:last-child)::before {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
}

[dir="ltr"] .step.completed:not(:first-child)::before,
[dir="ltr"] .step.active:not(:first-child)::before {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
}

.step-number {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 14px;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  border: 2px solid var(--color-border);
  background: white;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  transition: all 0.3s;
}

.step.active .step-number {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.step.completed .step-number {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.step-label {
  font-size: 13px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  text-align: center;
}

.step.active .step-label,
.step.completed .step-label {
  color: var(--color-primary);
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* ========================================
   CARDS
   ======================================== */
.card {
  background: white;
  border-radius: var(--border-radius-lg);
  padding: 24px;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
}

.card-accent {
  background: var(--color-card-bg);
  border: 1px dashed var(--color-primary);
}

/* ========================================
   BUTTONS
   ======================================== */
.btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 8px;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 500;
  border: none;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}

.btn-primary {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-primary-dark);
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(0, 166, 81, 0.3);
}

.btn-outline {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
}

.btn-outline:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-background-alt);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
}

.btn-accent {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.btn-danger {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-error);
  color: var(--color-error);
}

.btn-danger:hover {
  background-color: #FEF2F2;
}

/* ========================================
   FORM ELEMENTS
   ======================================== */
.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.form-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 14px;
  transition: border-color 0.2s, box-shadow 0.2s;
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(0, 166, 81, 0.1);
}

/* ========================================
   GRID LAYOUT
   ======================================== */
.grid-2 {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 16px;
}

.grid-3 {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
  gap: 16px;
}

/* ========================================
   TEXT UTILITIES
   ======================================== */
.text-accent {
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.text-primary {
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.text-muted {
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.text-center {
  text-align: center;
}

.font-bold {
  font-weight: 700;
}

/* ========================================
   SPACING
   ======================================== */
.mt-4 { margin-top: 16px; }
.mt-6 { margin-top: 24px; }
.mt-8 { margin-top: 32px; }
.mb-4 { margin-bottom: 16px; }
.mb-6 { margin-bottom: 24px; }
.p-4 { padding: 16px; }
.p-6 { padding: 24px; }

/* ========================================
   LOADING SPINNER
   ======================================== */
.loading-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 48px;
  gap: 16px;
}

.spinner {
  width: 48px;
  height: 48px;
  border: 4px solid var(--color-border);
  border-top-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

/* ========================================
   ACCORDION
   ======================================== */
.accordion-item {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  margin-bottom: 12px;
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: border-color 0.2s;
}

.accordion-item:hover {
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
}

.accordion-header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 16px 20px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background-color 0.2s;
}

.accordion-header:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-background-alt);
}

.accordion-title {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 12px;
  font-size: 15px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.accordion-number {
  width: 28px;
  height: 28px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 2px solid var(--color-primary);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 13px;
  color: var(--color-primary);
  font-weight: 600;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.accordion-content {
  padding: 0 20px 20px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 1.8;
}

[dir="rtl"] .accordion-content {
  padding-right: 60px;
}

[dir="ltr"] .accordion-content {
  padding-left: 60px;
}

/* ========================================
   INFO CARD
   ======================================== */
.info-card {
  background: var(--color-card-bg);
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  padding: 20px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  gap: 16px;
}

.info-card-icon {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.info-card h3 {
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 4px;
}

.info-card p {
  font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
}

/* ========================================
   BADGE
   ======================================== */
.badge {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 4px;
  padding: 4px 12px;
  border-radius: 16px;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.badge-success {
  background-color: #D1FAE5;
  color: #059669;
}

.badge-warning {
  background-color: #FEF3C7;
  color: #D97706;
}

.badge-primary {
  background-color: var(--color-card-bg);
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

/* ========================================
   RESPONSIVE
   ======================================== */
@media (max-width: 1200px) {
  .header-nav-buttons {
    gap: 6px;
  }
  
  .nav-btn {
    padding: 8px 12px;
    min-width: 70px;
    min-height: 50px;
    font-size: 10px;
  }
  
  .footer-links-container {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  }
}

@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .footer-container {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .footer-brand-column {
    flex-direction: row;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    width: 100%;
  }
  
  .footer-links-container {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .header-container {
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 16px;
  }
  
  .header-logos {
    order: 1;
  }
  
  .header-nav-buttons {
    order: 2;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: center;
    width: 100%;
  }
  
  .user-section {
    order: -1;
  }
  
  .nav-btn {
    flex: 0 0 auto;
  }
  
  .footer-links-container {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
    gap: 24px;
  }
  
  .footer-link-column {
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .social-icons-row,
  .accessibility-icons {
    justify-content: center;
  }
  
  .footer-copyright-v2 .footer-container {
    flex-direction: column;
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .stepper {
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 16px;
  }
  
  .step {
    flex: 0 0 auto;
    min-width: 100px;
  }
  
  .step::before {
    display: none !important;
  }
  
  .grid-2, .grid-3 {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
  
  .gov-logos {
    display: none;
  }
}

```

```css
/* Official Absher Design System */
@font-face {
  font-family: 'DIN Next LT Arabic';
  src: url('https://www.absher.sa/portal/individuals/assets/fonts/DINNextLTArabic-Regular-4.ttf') format('truetype');
  font-weight: 400;
  font-style: normal;
}

@font-face {
  font-family: 'DIN Next LT Arabic';
  src: url('https://www.absher.sa/portal/individuals/assets/fonts/DINNextLTArabic-Medium-4.ttf') format('truetype');
  font-weight: 500;
  font-style: normal;
}

@font-face {
  font-family: 'DIN Next LT Arabic';
  src: url('https://www.absher.sa/portal/individuals/assets/fonts/DINNextLTArabic-Bold-4.ttf') format('truetype');
  font-weight: 700;
  font-style: normal;
}

:root {
  /* Official Absher Colors (kept for reference) */
  --absher-green: #00A651;
  --absher-green-dark: #008C44;
  --absher-green-light: #00C95D;
  --absher-blue: #0066B3;
  --absher-brown: #8B6914;
  --absher-gold: #C2A261;
  --color-gold: #C2A261;
  --color-gold-light: #D4AF37;
  
  /* Primary Colors - Purple Theme (Default) */
  --color-primary: #544099;
  --color-primary-dark: #3d2f73;
  --color-primary-light: #6b52b8;
  
  /* Secondary Colors */
  --color-secondary: #544099;
  --color-accent: #544099;
  --color-accent-light: #6b52b8;
  
  /* Background Colors */
  --color-background: #FFFFFF;
  --color-background-alt: #F8F9FA;
  --color-background-pattern: #F0F0F8;
  --color-card-bg: #E8E8F5;
  
  /* Text Colors */
  --color-text-primary: #544099;
  --color-text-secondary: #6B7280;
  --color-text-muted: #9CA3AF;
  --color-text-white: #FFFFFF;
  
  /* Border & Shadow */
  --color-border: #E5E7EB;
  --color-success: #10B981;
  --color-error: #EF4444;
  --color-warning: #F59E0B;
  
  /* Typography */
  --font-family: 'DIN Next LT Arabic', 'IBM Plex Sans Arabic', 'Noto Sans Arabic', sans-serif;
  
  /* Border Radius */
  --border-radius: 12px;
  --border-radius-lg: 16px;
  --border-radius-xl: 24px;
  
  /* Shadows */
  --shadow-sm: 0 1px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
  --shadow: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  --shadow-lg: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  --shadow-xl: 0 20px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

html {
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

body {
  font-family: var(--font-family);
  background-color: var(--color-background);
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  line-height: 1.7;
  transition: direction 0.3s ease;
}

/* RTL Support */
body[dir="rtl"] {
  direction: rtl;
  text-align: right;
}

body[dir="ltr"] {
  direction: ltr;
  text-align: left;
}

/* Direction-aware utilities */
[dir="rtl"] .flip-rtl {
  transform: scaleX(-1);
}

[dir="ltr"] .flip-ltr {
  transform: scaleX(-1);
}

a {
  text-decoration: none;
  color: inherit;
}

button {
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: inherit;
}

input, select, textarea {
  font-family: inherit;
}

.container {
  max-width: 1280px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 24px;
}

/* ========================================
   ABSHER HEADER V2 (Dark Charcoal)
   ======================================== */
.absher-header-v2 {
  background-color: #F5F5F5;
  padding: 0;
  position: sticky;
  top: 0;
  z-index: 100;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
}

.header-container-v2 {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: stretch;
  max-width: 1600px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0;
  min-height: 80px;
}

/* Header Logos (Right - no background) */
.header-logos-v2 {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 16px;
  padding: 0 24px;
}

.logo-link-v2 {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.header-logos-v2 .absher-logo {
  width: 28px;
  height: 42px;
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.vision-logo-v2 {
  height: 36px;
  width: auto;
  /* No filter needed - use original colors on light background */
}

/* Header Navigation (Center) */
.header-nav-v2 {
  display: flex;
  align-items: stretch;
  gap: 2px;
  flex: 1;
  justify-content: flex-end;
}

/* Navigation Card Buttons */
.nav-card-btn {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 6px;
  padding: 12px 20px;
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  color: #333;
  font-size: 11px;
  font-weight: 500;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-decoration: none;
  min-width: 90px;
}

.nav-card-icon {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
}

.nav-card-icon svg {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
  color: var(--color-primary);
  fill: currentColor;
}

.nav-card-label {
  white-space: nowrap;
  font-size: 11px;
  color: #555;
}

.nav-card-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(0, 114, 79, 0.08);
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.nav-card-btn:hover .nav-card-label {
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.nav-card-btn.active {
  background: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.nav-card-btn.active .nav-card-icon svg {
  color: white;
  fill: white;
}

.nav-card-btn.active .nav-card-label {
  color: white;
}

/* User Card */
.user-card {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 6px;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  background: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
  min-width: 90px;
}

.user-card-icon {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
  border-radius: 50%;
}

.user-card-icon svg {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  color: white;
  fill: white;
}

.user-card-name {
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 600;
}

/* Header Emblem (Left) */
.header-emblem {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 0 24px;
}

.emblem-img {
  height: 50px;
  width: auto;
  /* Dark emblem for light background */
  filter: invert(1) brightness(0.3);
}

/* Responsive Header V2 */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .header-container-v2 {
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }
  
  .header-nav-v2 {
    order: 3;
    width: 100%;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }
  
  .nav-card-btn {
    min-width: 70px;
    padding: 8px 12px;
    font-size: 10px;
  }
  
  .header-logos-v2 {
    order: 1;
  }
  
  .header-emblem {
    order: 2;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .nav-card-btn {
    min-width: 60px;
    padding: 6px 8px;
  }
  
  .nav-card-icon svg {
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
  }
  
  .nav-card-label {
    font-size: 9px;
  }
  
  .emblem-img {
    height: 36px;
  }
}

/* ========================================
   OLD HEADER STYLES (Backward Compatibility)
   ======================================== */
.absher-header {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #E8E8E8 0%, #F5F5F5 100%);
  padding: 12px 0;
  position: sticky;
  top: 0;
  z-index: 100;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  border-bottom: 3px solid var(--color-primary);
}

.header-container {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  max-width: 1400px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 24px;
  gap: 24px;
}

.header-logos {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 16px;
}

.logo-link {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.absher-logo {
  width: 32px;
  height: 48px;
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.vision-logo {
  height: 40px;
  width: auto;
}

.header-nav-buttons {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.header-nav-buttons {
  display: flex;
  align-items: stretch;
  gap: 8px;
}

.header-nav-buttons > * {
  flex: 1 1 0;
  min-width: 85px;
  max-width: 110px;
}

.user-section {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 4px;
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  padding: 10px 12px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: white;
  min-height: 70px;
}

.user-avatar {
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: white;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.user-name {
  color: white;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* MOI Logo Section */
.header-moi-logo {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 0 24px;
}

.moi-logo {
  height: 50px;
  width: auto;
}

.nav-btn {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 4px;
  padding: 10px 12px;
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid #E0E0E0;
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: #555;
  font-size: 10px;
  font-weight: 500;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-decoration: none;
  min-height: 70px;
  text-align: center;
  line-height: 1.3;
}

.nav-btn svg {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  stroke: currentColor;
}

.nav-btn:hover {
  background-color: #F0F0F0;
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.nav-btn.active {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.nav-btn.active svg {
  stroke: white;
}

/* Old classes for backward compatibility */
.header-logo {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.header-logo svg,
.header-logo img {
  height: 48px;
  width: auto;
}

.gov-logos {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 16px;
}

.gov-logo {
  height: 40px;
  width: auto;
  opacity: 0.9;
}

/* ========================================
   ABSHER FOOTER V2 STYLES
   ======================================== */
.absher-footer-v2 {
  margin-top: auto;
}

.footer-main-v2 {
  background-color: #F5F5F5;
  padding: 40px 0;
}

.footer-container {
  max-width: 1400px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 24px;
  display: flex;
  gap: 32px;
}

/* In RTL, reverse the order so brand column is on the LEFT */
[dir="rtl"] .footer-main-v2 .footer-container {
  flex-direction: row-reverse;
}

/* Brand Column */
.footer-brand-column {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  padding: 24px;
  border-radius: 12px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 16px;
  min-width: 200px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.brand-logo {
  color: white;
}

.brand-logo .logo {
  width: 50px;
  height: 75px;
}

.brand-phone {
  color: white;
  font-size: 20px;
  font-weight: 700;
  text-decoration: none;
  direction: ltr;
}

.app-downloads-v2 {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 8px;
  width: 100%;
}

.app-downloads-v2 a {
  display: block;
}

.app-downloads-v2 img {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 140px;
  height: auto;
}

.registered-badge {
  background: white;
  padding: 8px 12px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 4px;
  margin-top: 8px;
}

.registered-badge span {
  font-size: 10px;
  color: #666;
}

.registered-badge img {
  height: 40px;
  width: auto;
}

/* Footer Links Container */
.footer-links-container {
  flex: 1;
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
  gap: 32px;
}

.footer-link-column h4 {
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.footer-link-column ul {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}

.footer-link-column ul li {
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.footer-link-column ul li a {
  color: #666;
  font-size: 13px;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: color 0.2s;
}

.footer-link-column ul li a:hover {
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

/* Social Icons */
.social-icons-row {
  display: flex;
  gap: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.social-icons-row a {
  width: 36px;
  height: 36px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 1px solid #DDD;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: #666;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  background: white;
}

.social-icons-row a:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

/* Accessibility Icons */
.accessibility-icons {
  display: flex;
  gap: 8px;
}

.accessibility-icons button {
  width: 36px;
  height: 36px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 1px solid #DDD;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: #666;
  background: white;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}

.accessibility-icons button:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.accessibility-icons button svg {
  stroke: currentColor;
}

.mt-3 {
  margin-top: 16px;
}

/* Copyright Bar V2 */
.footer-copyright-v2 {
  background-color: #F0F0F0;
  padding: 16px 0;
  border-top: 1px solid #E0E0E0;
}

.footer-copyright-v2 .footer-container {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 16px;
}

.copyright-links {
  display: flex;
  gap: 12px;
  align-items: center;
}

.copyright-links a {
  color: #666;
  font-size: 13px;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: color 0.2s;
}

.copyright-links a:hover {
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.copyright-links span {
  color: #CCC;
}

.footer-copyright-v2 .copyright-text {
  color: #666;
  font-size: 13px;
}

.nic-logo {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
  color: #666;
  font-size: 12px;
}

.nic-logo img {
  height: 28px;
  width: auto;
}

.footer-bottom-links a {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6);
  font-size: 13px;
  transition: color 0.2s;
}

.footer-bottom-links a:hover {
  color: white;
}

/* ========================================
   MAIN CONTENT
   ======================================== */
.main {
  min-height: calc(100vh - 200px);
}

/* Container class for auto margin on different screens */
.container {
  max-width: 1400px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 24px;
  width: 100%;
}

@media (max-width: 1200px) {
  .container {
    max-width: 1100px;
    padding: 0 20px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 992px) {
  .container {
    max-width: 900px;
    padding: 0 16px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .container {
    max-width: 100%;
    padding: 0 12px;
  }
}

/* ========================================
   PAGE HEADER
   ======================================== */
.page-header {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary) 0%, var(--color-primary-dark) 100%);
  padding: 48px 0;
  text-align: center;
}

.page-header h1 {
  color: white;
  font-size: 32px;
  font-weight: 700;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 12px;
}

.page-header h1 svg {
  color: white;
}

.page-header p {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  font-size: 16px;
  margin-top: 12px;
}

/* ========================================
   STEPPER
   ======================================== */
.stepper {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0;
  padding: 24px 20px;
  background: white;
  border-radius: var(--border-radius-lg);
  margin: -30px auto 32px;
  max-width: 900px;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow);
  position: relative;
  z-index: 10;
}

.step {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  flex: 1;
  position: relative;
}

[dir="rtl"] .step:not(:last-child)::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  left: -50%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 2px;
  background-color: var(--color-border);
  z-index: -1;
}

[dir="ltr"] .step:not(:first-child)::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  right: 50%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 2px;
  background-color: var(--color-border);
  z-index: -1;
}

.step.completed:not(:last-child)::before,
.step.active:not(:last-child)::before {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
}

[dir="ltr"] .step.completed:not(:first-child)::before,
[dir="ltr"] .step.active:not(:first-child)::before {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
}

.step-number {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 14px;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  border: 2px solid var(--color-border);
  background: white;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  transition: all 0.3s;
}

.step.active .step-number {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.step.completed .step-number {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.step-label {
  font-size: 13px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  text-align: center;
}

.step.active .step-label,
.step.completed .step-label {
  color: var(--color-primary);
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* ========================================
   CARDS
   ======================================== */
.card {
  background: white;
  border-radius: var(--border-radius-lg);
  padding: 24px;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
}

.card-accent {
  background: var(--color-card-bg);
  border: 1px dashed var(--color-primary);
}

/* ========================================
   BUTTONS
   ======================================== */
.btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 8px;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 500;
  border: none;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}

.btn-primary {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-primary-dark);
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(0, 166, 81, 0.3);
}

.btn-outline {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
}

.btn-outline:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-background-alt);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
}

.btn-accent {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.btn-danger {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-error);
  color: var(--color-error);
}

.btn-danger:hover {
  background-color: #FEF2F2;
}

/* ========================================
   FORM ELEMENTS
   ======================================== */
.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.form-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 14px;
  transition: border-color 0.2s, box-shadow 0.2s;
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(0, 166, 81, 0.1);
}

/* ========================================
   GRID LAYOUT
   ======================================== */
.grid-2 {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 16px;
}

.grid-3 {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
  gap: 16px;
}

/* ========================================
   TEXT UTILITIES
   ======================================== */
.text-accent {
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.text-primary {
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.text-muted {
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.text-center {
  text-align: center;
}

.font-bold {
  font-weight: 700;
}

/* ========================================
   SPACING
   ======================================== */
.mt-4 { margin-top: 16px; }
.mt-6 { margin-top: 24px; }
.mt-8 { margin-top: 32px; }
.mb-4 { margin-bottom: 16px; }
.mb-6 { margin-bottom: 24px; }
.p-4 { padding: 16px; }
.p-6 { padding: 24px; }

/* ========================================
   LOADING SPINNER
   ======================================== */
.loading-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 48px;
  gap: 16px;
}

.spinner {
  width: 48px;
  height: 48px;
  border: 4px solid var(--color-border);
  border-top-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

/* ========================================
   ACCORDION
   ======================================== */
.accordion-item {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  margin-bottom: 12px;
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: border-color 0.2s;
}

.accordion-item:hover {
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
}

.accordion-header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 16px 20px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background-color 0.2s;
}

.accordion-header:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-background-alt);
}

.accordion-title {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 12px;
  font-size: 15px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.accordion-number {
  width: 28px;
  height: 28px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 2px solid var(--color-primary);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 13px;
  color: var(--color-primary);
  font-weight: 600;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.accordion-content {
  padding: 0 20px 20px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 1.8;
}

[dir="rtl"] .accordion-content {
  padding-right: 60px;
}

[dir="ltr"] .accordion-content {
  padding-left: 60px;
}

/* ========================================
   INFO CARD
   ======================================== */
.info-card {
  background: var(--color-card-bg);
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  padding: 20px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  gap: 16px;
}

.info-card-icon {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.info-card h3 {
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 4px;
}

.info-card p {
  font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
}

/* ========================================
   BADGE
   ======================================== */
.badge {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 4px;
  padding: 4px 12px;
  border-radius: 16px;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.badge-success {
  background-color: #D1FAE5;
  color: #059669;
}

.badge-warning {
  background-color: #FEF3C7;
  color: #D97706;
}

.badge-primary {
  background-color: var(--color-card-bg);
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

/* ========================================
   RESPONSIVE
   ======================================== */
@media (max-width: 1200px) {
  .header-nav-buttons {
    gap: 6px;
  }
  
  .nav-btn {
    padding: 8px 12px;
    min-width: 70px;
    min-height: 50px;
    font-size: 10px;
  }
  
  .footer-links-container {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  }
}

@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .footer-container {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .footer-brand-column {
    flex-direction: row;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    width: 100%;
  }
  
  .footer-links-container {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .header-container {
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 16px;
  }
  
  .header-logos {
    order: 1;
  }
  
  .header-nav-buttons {
    order: 2;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: center;
    width: 100%;
  }
  
  .user-section {
    order: -1;
  }
  
  .nav-btn {
    flex: 0 0 auto;
  }
  
  .footer-links-container {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
    gap: 24px;
  }
  
  .footer-link-column {
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .social-icons-row,
  .accessibility-icons {
    justify-content: center;
  }
  
  .footer-copyright-v2 .footer-container {
    flex-direction: column;
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .stepper {
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 16px;
  }
  
  .step {
    flex: 0 0 auto;
    min-width: 100px;
  }
  
  .step::before {
    display: none !important;
  }
  
  .grid-2, .grid-3 {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
  
  .gov-logos {
    display: none;
  }
}

```

Now let me add the sprite icon styles to match Absher's design:

```css
/* Official Absher Design System */
@font-face {
  font-family: 'DIN Next LT Arabic';
  src: url('https://www.absher.sa/portal/individuals/assets/fonts/DINNextLTArabic-Regular-4.ttf') format('truetype');
  font-weight: 400;
  font-style: normal;
}

@font-face {
  font-family: 'DIN Next LT Arabic';
  src: url('https://www.absher.sa/portal/individuals/assets/fonts/DINNextLTArabic-Medium-4.ttf') format('truetype');
  font-weight: 500;
  font-style: normal;
}

@font-face {
  font-family: 'DIN Next LT Arabic';
  src: url('https://www.absher.sa/portal/individuals/assets/fonts/DINNextLTArabic-Bold-4.ttf') format('truetype');
  font-weight: 700;
  font-style: normal;
}

:root {
  /* Official Absher Colors (kept for reference) */
  --absher-green: #00A651;
  --absher-green-dark: #008C44;
  --absher-green-light: #00C95D;
  --absher-blue: #0066B3;
  --absher-brown: #8B6914;
  --absher-gold: #C2A261;
  --color-gold: #C2A261;
  --color-gold-light: #D4AF37;
  
  /* Primary Colors - Purple Theme (Default) */
  --color-primary: #544099;
  --color-primary-dark: #3d2f73;
  --color-primary-light: #6b52b8;
  
  /* Secondary Colors */
  --color-secondary: #544099;
  --color-accent: #544099;
  --color-accent-light: #6b52b8;
  
  /* Background Colors */
  --color-background: #FFFFFF;
  --color-background-alt: #F8F9FA;
  --color-background-pattern: #F0F0F8;
  --color-card-bg: #E8E8F5;
  
  /* Text Colors */
  --color-text-primary: #544099;
  --color-text-secondary: #6B7280;
  --color-text-muted: #9CA3AF;
  --color-text-white: #FFFFFF;
  
  /* Border & Shadow */
  --color-border: #E5E7EB;
  --color-success: #10B981;
  --color-error: #EF4444;
  --color-warning: #F59E0B;
  
  /* Typography */
  --font-family: 'DIN Next LT Arabic', 'IBM Plex Sans Arabic', 'Noto Sans Arabic', sans-serif;
  
  /* Border Radius */
  --border-radius: 12px;
  --border-radius-lg: 16px;
  --border-radius-xl: 24px;
  
  /* Shadows */
  --shadow-sm: 0 1px 2px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
  --shadow: 0 4px 6px -1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  --shadow-lg: 0 10px 15px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  --shadow-xl: 0 20px 25px -5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
}

* {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

html {
  scroll-behavior: smooth;
}

body {
  font-family: var(--font-family);
  background-color: var(--color-background);
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  line-height: 1.7;
  transition: direction 0.3s ease;
}

/* RTL Support */
body[dir="rtl"] {
  direction: rtl;
  text-align: right;
}

body[dir="ltr"] {
  direction: ltr;
  text-align: left;
}

/* Direction-aware utilities */
[dir="rtl"] .flip-rtl {
  transform: scaleX(-1);
}

[dir="ltr"] .flip-ltr {
  transform: scaleX(-1);
}

a {
  text-decoration: none;
  color: inherit;
}

button {
  cursor: pointer;
  font-family: inherit;
}

input, select, textarea {
  font-family: inherit;
}

.container {
  max-width: 1280px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 24px;
}

/* ========================================
   ABSHER HEADER V2 (Dark Charcoal)
   ======================================== */
.absher-header-v2 {
  background-color: #F5F5F5;
  padding: 0;
  position: sticky;
  top: 0;
  z-index: 100;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
}

.header-container-v2 {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: stretch;
  max-width: 1600px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0;
  min-height: 80px;
}

/* Header Logos (Right - no background) */
.header-logos-v2 {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 16px;
  padding: 0 24px;
}

.logo-link-v2 {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.header-logos-v2 .absher-logo {
  width: 28px;
  height: 42px;
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.vision-logo-v2 {
  height: 36px;
  width: auto;
  /* No filter needed - use original colors on light background */
}

/* Header Navigation (Center) */
.header-nav-v2 {
  display: flex;
  align-items: stretch;
  gap: 2px;
  flex: 1;
  justify-content: flex-end;
}

/* Navigation Card Buttons */
.nav-card-btn {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 6px;
  padding: 12px 20px;
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  color: #333;
  font-size: 11px;
  font-weight: 500;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-decoration: none;
  min-width: 90px;
}

.nav-card-icon {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
}

.nav-card-icon svg {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
  color: var(--color-primary);
  fill: currentColor;
}

.nav-card-label {
  white-space: nowrap;
  font-size: 11px;
  color: #555;
}

.nav-card-btn:hover {
  background: rgba(0, 114, 79, 0.08);
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.nav-card-btn:hover .nav-card-label {
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.nav-card-btn.active {
  background: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.nav-card-btn.active .nav-card-icon svg {
  color: white;
  fill: white;
}

.nav-card-btn.active .nav-card-label {
  color: white;
}

/* User Card */
.user-card {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 6px;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  background: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
  min-width: 90px;
}

.user-card-icon {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
  background: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
  border-radius: 50%;
}

.user-card-icon svg {
  width: 20px;
  height: 20px;
  color: white;
  fill: white;
}

.user-card-name {
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 600;
}

/* Header Emblem (Left) */
.header-emblem {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 0 24px;
}

.emblem-img {
  height: 50px;
  width: auto;
  /* Dark emblem for light background */
  filter: invert(1) brightness(0.3);
}

/* Responsive Header V2 */
@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .header-container-v2 {
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }
  
  .header-nav-v2 {
    order: 3;
    width: 100%;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
  }
  
  .nav-card-btn {
    min-width: 70px;
    padding: 8px 12px;
    font-size: 10px;
  }
  
  .header-logos-v2 {
    order: 1;
  }
  
  .header-emblem {
    order: 2;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .nav-card-btn {
    min-width: 60px;
    padding: 6px 8px;
  }
  
  .nav-card-icon svg {
    width: 20px;
    height: 20px;
  }
  
  .nav-card-label {
    font-size: 9px;
  }
  
  .emblem-img {
    height: 36px;
  }
}

/* ========================================
   OLD HEADER STYLES (Backward Compatibility)
   ======================================== */
.absher-header {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, #E8E8E8 0%, #F5F5F5 100%);
  padding: 12px 0;
  position: sticky;
  top: 0;
  z-index: 100;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  border-bottom: 3px solid var(--color-primary);
}

.header-container {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  max-width: 1400px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 24px;
  gap: 24px;
}

.header-logos {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 16px;
}

.logo-link {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.absher-logo {
  width: 32px;
  height: 48px;

}

.vision-logo {
  height: 40px;
  width: auto;
}

.header-nav-buttons {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.header-nav-buttons {
  display: flex;
  align-items: stretch;
  gap: 8px;
}

.header-nav-buttons > * {
  flex: 1 1 0;
  min-width: 85px;
  max-width: 110px;
}

.user-section {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 4px;
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  padding: 10px 12px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: white;
  min-height: 70px;
}

.user-avatar {
  width: 32px;
  height: 32px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.2);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: white;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.user-name {
  color: white;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* MOI Logo Section */
.header-moi-logo {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 0 24px;
}

.moi-logo {
  height: 50px;
  width: auto;
}

.nav-btn {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 4px;
  padding: 10px 12px;
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid #E0E0E0;
  border-radius: 8px;
  color: #555;
  font-size: 10px;
  font-weight: 500;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  text-decoration: none;
  min-height: 70px;
  text-align: center;
  line-height: 1.3;
}

/* Sprite icon box for Absher-style icons */
.spritejobs {
  width: 28px;
  height: 28px;
  background-image: url('https://www.absher.sa/wps/portal/individuals/static/cdn/images/sprite-jobs.png');
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  display: inline-block;
  margin-bottom: 2px;
}

/* Icon positions in sprite */
.spritejobs.dashboard {
  background-position: -10px -10px;
}

.spritejobs.editMobile {
  background-position: -10px -58px;
}

.spritejobs.notification {
  background-position: -10px -106px;
}

.spritejobs.userguide {
  background-position: -10px -202px;
}

.spritejobs.languageal {
  background-position: -10px -250px;
}

.spritejobs.icon-logout {
  background-position: -10px -154px;
}

/* Active state - use green variant of sprite */
.nav-btn.active .spritejobs {
  filter: brightness(0) saturate(100%) invert(34%) sepia(98%) saturate(408%) hue-rotate(94deg) brightness(96%) contrast(93%);
}

.nav-btn svg {
  width: 22px;
  height: 22px;
  stroke: currentColor;
}

.nav-btn:hover {
  background-color: #F0F0F0;
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.nav-btn:hover .spritejobs {
  filter: brightness(0) saturate(100%) invert(34%) sepia(98%) saturate(408%) hue-rotate(94deg) brightness(96%) contrast(93%);
}

.nav-btn.active {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.nav-btn.active svg {
  stroke: white;
}

/* Old classes for backward compatibility */
.header-logo {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

.header-logo svg,
.header-logo img {
  height: 48px;
  width: auto;
}

.gov-logos {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 16px;
}

.gov-logo {
  height: 40px;
  width: auto;
  opacity: 0.9;
}

/* ========================================
   ABSHER FOOTER V2 STYLES
   ======================================== */
.absher-footer-v2 {
  margin-top: auto;
}

.footer-main-v2 {
  background-color: #F5F5F5;
  padding: 40px 0;
}

.footer-container {
  max-width: 1400px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 24px;
  display: flex;
  gap: 32px;
}

/* In RTL, reverse the order so brand column is on the LEFT */
[dir="rtl"] .footer-main-v2 .footer-container {
  flex-direction: row-reverse;
}

/* Brand Column */
.footer-brand-column {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  padding: 24px;
  border-radius: 12px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 16px;
  min-width: 200px;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.brand-logo {
  color: white;
}

.brand-logo .logo {
  width: 50px;
  height: 75px;
}

.brand-phone {
  color: white;
  font-size: 20px;
  font-weight: 700;
  text-decoration: none;
  direction: ltr;
}

.app-downloads-v2 {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 8px;
  width: 100%;
}

.app-downloads-v2 a {
  display: block;
}

.app-downloads-v2 img {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 140px;
  height: auto;
}

.registered-badge {
  background: white;
  padding: 8px 12px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 4px;
  margin-top: 8px;
}

.registered-badge span {
  font-size: 10px;
  color: #666;
}

.registered-badge img {
  height: 40px;
  width: auto;
}

/* Footer Links Container */
.footer-links-container {
  flex: 1;
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
  gap: 32px;
}

.footer-link-column h4 {
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.footer-link-column ul {
  list-style: none;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
}

.footer-link-column ul li {
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.footer-link-column ul li a {
  color: #666;
  font-size: 13px;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: color 0.2s;
}

.footer-link-column ul li a:hover {
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

/* Social Icons */
.social-icons-row {
  display: flex;
  gap: 8px;
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.social-icons-row a {
  width: 36px;
  height: 36px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 1px solid #DDD;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: #666;
  transition: all 0.2s;
  background: white;
}

.social-icons-row a:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

/* Accessibility Icons */
.accessibility-icons {
  display: flex;
  gap: 8px;
}

.accessibility-icons button {
  width: 36px;
  height: 36px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 1px solid #DDD;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  color: #666;
  background: white;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}

.accessibility-icons button:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.accessibility-icons button svg {
  stroke: currentColor;
}

.mt-3 {
  margin-top: 16px;
}

/* Copyright Bar V2 */
.footer-copyright-v2 {
  background-color: #F0F0F0;
  padding: 16px 0;
  border-top: 1px solid #E0E0E0;
}

.footer-copyright-v2 .footer-container {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: space-between;
  align-items: center;
  flex-wrap: wrap;
  gap: 16px;
}

.copyright-links {
  display: flex;
  gap: 12px;
  align-items: center;
}

.copyright-links a {
  color: #666;
  font-size: 13px;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: color 0.2s;
}

.copyright-links a:hover {
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.copyright-links span {
  color: #CCC;
}

.footer-copyright-v2 .copyright-text {
  color: #666;
  font-size: 13px;
}

.nic-logo {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 8px;
  color: #666;
  font-size: 12px;
}

.nic-logo img {
  height: 28px;
  width: auto;
}

.footer-bottom-links a {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.6);
  font-size: 13px;
  transition: color 0.2s;
}

.footer-bottom-links a:hover {
  color: white;
}

/* ========================================
   MAIN CONTENT
   ======================================== */
.main {
  min-height: calc(100vh - 200px);
}

/* Container class for auto margin on different screens */
.container {
  max-width: 1400px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 0 24px;
  width: 100%;
}

@media (max-width: 1200px) {
  .container {
    max-width: 1100px;
    padding: 0 20px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 992px) {
  .container {
    max-width: 900px;
    padding: 0 16px;
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .container {
    max-width: 100%;
    padding: 0 12px;
  }
}

/* ========================================
   PAGE HEADER
   ======================================== */
.page-header {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-primary) 0%, var(--color-primary-dark) 100%);
  padding: 48px 0;
  text-align: center;
}

.page-header h1 {
  color: white;
  font-size: 32px;
  font-weight: 700;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 12px;
}

.page-header h1 svg {
  color: white;
}

.page-header p {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  font-size: 16px;
  margin-top: 12px;
}

/* ========================================
   STEPPER
   ======================================== */
.stepper {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0;
  padding: 24px 20px;
  background: white;
  border-radius: var(--border-radius-lg);
  margin: -30px auto 32px;
  max-width: 900px;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow);
  position: relative;
  z-index: 10;
}

.step {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  flex: 1;
  position: relative;
}

[dir="rtl"] .step:not(:last-child)::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  left: -50%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 2px;
  background-color: var(--color-border);
  z-index: -1;
}

[dir="ltr"] .step:not(:first-child)::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  right: 50%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 2px;
  background-color: var(--color-border);
  z-index: -1;
}

.step.completed:not(:last-child)::before,
.step.active:not(:last-child)::before {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
}

[dir="ltr"] .step.completed:not(:first-child)::before,
[dir="ltr"] .step.active:not(:first-child)::before {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
}

.step-number {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 14px;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  border: 2px solid var(--color-border);
  background: white;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  transition: all 0.3s;
}

.step.active .step-number {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.step.completed .step-number {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.step-label {
  font-size: 13px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  text-align: center;
}

.step.active .step-label,
.step.completed .step-label {
  color: var(--color-primary);
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* ========================================
   CARDS
   ======================================== */
.card {
  background: white;
  border-radius: var(--border-radius-lg);
  padding: 24px;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
}

.card-accent {
  background: var(--color-card-bg);
  border: 1px dashed var(--color-primary);
}

/* ========================================
   BUTTONS
   ======================================== */
.btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 8px;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 500;
  border: none;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}

.btn-primary {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-primary-dark);
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(0, 166, 81, 0.3);
}

.btn-outline {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
}

.btn-outline:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-background-alt);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
}

.btn-accent {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.btn-danger {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-error);
  color: var(--color-error);
}

.btn-danger:hover {
  background-color: #FEF2F2;
}

/* ========================================
   FORM ELEMENTS
   ======================================== */
.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.form-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 14px;
  transition: border-color 0.2s, box-shadow 0.2s;
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(0, 166, 81, 0.1);
}

/* ========================================
   GRID LAYOUT
   ======================================== */
.grid-2 {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 16px;
}

.grid-3 {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
  gap: 16px;
}

/* ========================================
   TEXT UTILITIES
   ======================================== */
.text-accent {
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.text-primary {
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.text-muted {
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.text-center {
  text-align: center;
}

.font-bold {
  font-weight: 700;
}

/* ========================================
   SPACING
   ======================================== */
.mt-4 { margin-top: 16px; }
.mt-6 { margin-top: 24px; }
.mt-8 { margin-top: 32px; }
.mb-4 { margin-bottom: 16px; }
.mb-6 { margin-bottom: 24px; }
.p-4 { padding: 16px; }
.p-6 { padding: 24px; }

/* ========================================
   LOADING SPINNER
   ======================================== */
.loading-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 48px;
  gap: 16px;
}

.spinner {
  width: 48px;
  height: 48px;
  border: 4px solid var(--color-border);
  border-top-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

/* ========================================
   ACCORDION
   ======================================== */
.accordion-item {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  margin-bottom: 12px;
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: border-color 0.2s;
}

.accordion-item:hover {
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
}

.accordion-header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 16px 20px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background-color 0.2s;
}

.accordion-header:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-background-alt);
}

.accordion-title {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 12px;
  font-size: 15px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.accordion-number {
  width: 28px;
  height: 28px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 2px solid var(--color-primary);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 13px;
  color: var(--color-primary);
  font-weight: 600;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.accordion-content {
  padding: 0 20px 20px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 1.8;
}

[dir="rtl"] .accordion-content {
  padding-right: 60px;
}

[dir="ltr"] .accordion-content {
  padding-left: 60px;
}

/* ========================================
   INFO CARD
   ======================================== */
.info-card {
  background: var(--color-card-bg);
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  padding: 20px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  gap: 16px;
}

.info-card-icon {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.info-card h3 {
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 4px;
}

.info-card p {
  font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
}

/* ========================================
   BADGE
   ======================================== */
.badge {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 4px;
  padding: 4px 12px;
  border-radius: 16px;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.badge-success {
  background-color: #D1FAE5;
  color: #059669;
}

.badge-warning {
  background-color: #FEF3C7;
  color: #D97706;
}

.badge-primary {
  background-color: var(--color-card-bg);
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

/* ========================================
   RESPONSIVE
   ======================================== */
@media (max-width: 1200px) {
  .header-nav-buttons {
    gap: 6px;
  }
  
  .nav-btn {
    padding: 8px 12px;
    min-width: 70px;
    min-height: 50px;
    font-size: 10px;
  }
  
  .footer-links-container {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  }
}

@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .footer-container {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .footer-brand-column {
    flex-direction: row;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    width: 100%;
  }
  
  .footer-links-container {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .header-container {
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 16px;
  }
  
  .header-logos {
    order: 1;
  }
  
  .header-nav-buttons {
    order: 2;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: center;
    width: 100%;
  }
  
  .user-section {
    order: -1;
  }
  
  .nav-btn {
    flex: 0 0 auto;
  }
  
  .footer-links-container {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
    gap: 24px;
  }
  
  .footer-link-column {
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .social-icons-row,
  .accessibility-icons {
    justify-content: center;
  }
  
  .footer-copyright-v2 .footer-container {
    flex-direction: column;
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .stepper {
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 16px;
  }
  
  .step {
    flex: 0 0 auto;
    min-width: 100px;
  }
  
  .step::before {
    display: none !important;
  }
  
  .grid-2, .grid-3 {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
  
  .gov-logos {
    display: none;
  }
}
```

```javascriptreact
            to="/home" 
            className={`nav-btn ${location.pathname === '/home' || location.pathname === '/' ? 'active' : ''}`}

            alt="MOI Logo"
            className="moi-logo"
          />
        </div>
      </div>
    </header>
  )
}

export default Header
```
