```html
            align-items: center;
            gap: 12px;
        }
        
        .data-card h3::before {
            content: '';
            width: 8px;
            height: 8px;
            background: var(--primary);
            border-radius: 50%;
        }
        
        .data-card ul {
            list-style: none;
        }
        
        .data-card li {
            padding: 10px 0;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            color: #ccc;
        }
        
        .data-card li:last-child {
            border-bottom: none;
        }
        
        /* Tech Section */
        .tech-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 24px;
            margin-top: 40px;
        }
        
        .tech-card {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.1), rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.05));
            border: 1px solid rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.2);
            border-radius: 16px;
            padding: 30px;
            text-align: center;
            transition: transform 0.3s, border-color 0.3s;
        }
        
        .tech-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            border-color: var(--primary);
        }
        
        .tech-icon {
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            background: rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.2);
            border-radius: 12px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin: 0 auto 20px;
            font-size: 28px;
        }
        
        .tech-card h4 {
            color: var(--primary);
            font-size: 18px;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
        }
        
        .tech-card p {
            color: #999;
            font-size: 14px;
        }
        
        /* Process Flow */
        .process-flow {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: flex-start;
            margin-top: 60px;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .process-flow::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 40px;
            left: 10%;
            right: 10%;
            height: 4px;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary), var(--primary-light));
            z-index: 0;
        }
        
        .process-step {
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
            flex: 1;
            max-width: 180px;
        }
        
        .step-number {
            width: 80px;
            height: 80px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary), var(--primary-dark));
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin: 0 auto 20px;
            font-size: 32px;
            font-weight: 700;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.4);
        }
        
        .step-title {
            font-size: 16px;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #fff;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        
        .step-desc {
            font-size: 13px;
            color: #888;
        }
        
        /* Algorithm Section */
        .algorithm-box {
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
            border: 1px solid rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.3);
            border-radius: 16px;
            padding: 40px;
            margin-top: 40px;
        }
        
        .algorithm-box h3 {
            color: var(--primary);
            font-size: 24px;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        .risk-factors {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(5, 1fr);
            gap: 20px;
            margin-bottom: 40px;
        }
        
        .risk-factor {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px;
            background: rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.1);
            border-radius: 12px;
        }
        
        .risk-factor .percentage {
            font-size: 36px;
            font-weight: 700;
            color: var(--primary);
        }
        
        .risk-factor .label {
            font-size: 14px;
            color: #aaa;
            margin-top: 8px;
        }
        
        .risk-levels {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 40px;
        }
        
        .risk-level {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px 40px;
            border-radius: 12px;
        }
        
        .risk-level.low {
            background: rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.2);
            border: 2px solid var(--primary);
        }
        
        .risk-level.medium {
            background: rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.2);
            border: 2px solid #FFC107;
        }
        
        .risk-level.high {
            background: rgba(244, 67, 54, 0.2);
            border: 2px solid #F44336;
        }
        
        .risk-level .level-name {
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        
        .risk-level .multiplier {
            font-size: 24px;
            font-weight: 700;
        }
        
        .risk-level.low .level-name, .risk-level.low .multiplier { color: var(--primary); }
        .risk-level.medium .level-name, .risk-level.medium .multiplier { color: #FFC107; }
        .risk-level.high .level-name, .risk-level.high .multiplier { color: #F44336; }
        
        /* Notification Types */
        .notification-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
            gap: 20px;
            margin-top: 40px;
        }
        
        .notification-card {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border-radius: 12px;
            padding: 24px;
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        .notification-icon {
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            background: rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.2);
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin: 0 auto 16px;
            font-size: 24px;
        }
        
        .notification-card h4 {
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 16px;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        
        .notification-card p {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 13px;
        }
        
        /* Screenshots Section */
        .screenshots-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 30px;
            margin-top: 40px;
        }
        
        .screenshot-card {
            background: #1a1a1a;
            border-radius: 16px;
            overflow: hidden;
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
        }
        
        .screenshot-header {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary), var(--primary-dark));
            padding: 16px 20px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 12px;
        }
        
        .screenshot-header .step-badge {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            padding: 4px 12px;
            border-radius: 20px;
            font-size: 12px;
        }
        
        .screenshot-header h4 {
            font-size: 16px;
        }
        
        .screenshot-body {
            padding: 30px;
            min-height: 200px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        .screenshot-body .icon {
            font-size: 48px;
            margin-bottom: 16px;
        }
        
        .screenshot-body p {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 14px;
        }
        
        /* Navigation */
        .slide-nav {
            position: fixed;
            left: 20px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 12px;
            z-index: 100;
        }
        
        .nav-dot {
            width: 12px;
            height: 12px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        
        .nav-dot:hover, .nav-dot.active {
            background: var(--primary);
            transform: scale(1.3);
        }
        
        /* Footer */
        .slide-footer {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 40px;
            color: #666;
            font-size: 14px;
        }
        
        @media (max-width: 1024px) {
            .data-grid, .tech-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            
            .process-flow {
                flex-direction: column;
                align-items: center;
                gap: 30px;
            }
            
            .process-flow::before {
                display: none;
            }
            
            .risk-factors {

            }
            
            .screenshots-grid {

    </style>

    <script>
        // Smooth scroll for navigation
        document.querySelectorAll('.nav-dot').forEach(dot => {
            dot.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
                target.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' });
            });
        });

        // Update active dot on scroll
        window.addEventListener('scroll', function() {
            const slides = document.querySelectorAll('.slide');
            const dots = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-dot');
            
            slides.forEach((slide, index) => {
                const rect = slide.getBoundingClientRect();
                if (rect.top >= -200 && rect.top < window.innerHeight / 2) {
                    dots.forEach(d => d.classList.remove('active'));
                    dots[index].classList.add('active');
                }
            });
        });
    </script>
```

```html
            padding: 60px 40px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            justify-content: center;
            position: relative;
            overflow: hidden;
        }
        
        .slide::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 0;
            left: 0;
            right: 0;
            bottom: 0;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.1) 0%, rgba(123, 93, 194, 0.1) 100%);
            z-index: 0;
        }
        
        .slide-content {
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
            max-width: 1200px;
            margin: 0 auto;
            width: 100%;
        }
        
        .slide-title {
            font-size: 48px;
            font-weight: 800;
            color: var(--primary);
            margin-bottom: 40px;
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        .slide-subtitle {
            font-size: 24px;
            color: #888;
            text-align: center;
            margin-bottom: 60px;
        }
        
        /* Title Slide */
        .title-slide {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1a1a2e 0%, #0a0a0a 100%);
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        .logo-container {
            margin-bottom: 40px;
        }
        
        .logo-container svg {
            width: 100px;
            height: 150px;
            color: var(--primary);
        }
        
        .main-title {
            font-size: 72px;
            font-weight: 800;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary), var(--primary-light));
            -webkit-background-clip: text;
            -webkit-text-fill-color: transparent;
            background-clip: text;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
        }
        
        .main-subtitle {
            font-size: 28px;
            color: #aaa;
            max-width: 800px;
            margin: 0 auto 40px;
        }
        
        /* Data Section */
        .data-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            gap: 30px;
            margin-top: 40px;
        }
        
        .data-card {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border: 1px solid rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.3);
            border-radius: 16px;
            padding: 30px;
        }
        
        .data-card h3 {
            color: var(--primary);
            font-size: 22px;
            margin-bottom: 20px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 12px;
        }
        
        .data-card h3::before {
            content: '';
            width: 8px;
            height: 8px;
            background: var(--primary);
            border-radius: 50%;
        }
        
        .data-card ul {
            list-style: none;
        }
        
        .data-card li {
            padding: 10px 0;
            border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
            color: #ccc;
        }
        
        .data-card li:last-child {
            border-bottom: none;
        }
        
        /* Tech Section */
        .tech-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 24px;
            margin-top: 40px;
        }
        
        .tech-card {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.1), rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.05));
            border: 1px solid rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.2);
            border-radius: 16px;
            padding: 30px;
            text-align: center;
            transition: transform 0.3s, border-color 0.3s;
        }
        
        .tech-card:hover {
            transform: translateY(-5px);
            border-color: var(--primary);
        }
        
        .tech-icon {
            width: 60px;
            height: 60px;
            background: rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.2);
            border-radius: 12px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin: 0 auto 20px;
            font-size: 28px;
        }
        
        .tech-card h4 {
            color: var(--primary);
            font-size: 18px;
            margin-bottom: 12px;
        }
        
        .tech-card p {
            color: #999;
            font-size: 14px;
        }
        
        /* Process Flow */
        .process-flow {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: space-between;
            align-items: flex-start;
            margin-top: 60px;
            position: relative;
        }
        
        .process-flow::before {
            content: '';
            position: absolute;
            top: 40px;
            left: 10%;
            right: 10%;
            height: 4px;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, var(--primary), var(--primary-light));
            z-index: 0;
        }
        
        .process-step {
            text-align: center;
            position: relative;
            z-index: 1;
            flex: 1;
            max-width: 180px;
        }
        
        .step-number {
            width: 80px;
            height: 80px;
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary), var(--primary-dark));
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin: 0 auto 20px;
            font-size: 32px;
            font-weight: 700;
            box-shadow: 0 4px 20px rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.4);
        }
        
        .step-title {
            font-size: 16px;
            font-weight: 600;
            color: #fff;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        
        .step-desc {
            font-size: 13px;
            color: #888;
        }
        
        /* Algorithm Section */
        .algorithm-box {
            background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
            border: 1px solid rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.3);
            border-radius: 16px;
            padding: 40px;
            margin-top: 40px;
        }
        
        .algorithm-box h3 {
            color: var(--primary);
            font-size: 24px;
            margin-bottom: 30px;
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        .risk-factors {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(5, 1fr);
            gap: 20px;
            margin-bottom: 40px;
        }
        
        .risk-factor {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px;
            background: rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.1);
            border-radius: 12px;
        }
        
        .risk-factor .percentage {
            font-size: 36px;
            font-weight: 700;
            color: var(--primary);
        }
        
        .risk-factor .label {
            font-size: 14px;
            color: #aaa;
            margin-top: 8px;
        }
        
        .risk-levels {
            display: flex;
            justify-content: center;
            gap: 40px;
        }
        
        .risk-level {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 20px 40px;
            border-radius: 12px;
        }
        
        .risk-level.low {
            background: rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.2);
            border: 2px solid var(--primary);
        }
        
        .risk-level.medium {
            background: rgba(255, 193, 7, 0.2);
            border: 2px solid #FFC107;
        }
        
        .risk-level.high {
            background: rgba(244, 67, 54, 0.2);
            border: 2px solid #F44336;
        }
        
        .risk-level .level-name {
            font-size: 18px;
            font-weight: 600;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        
        .risk-level .multiplier {
            font-size: 24px;
            font-weight: 700;
        }
        
        .risk-level.low .level-name, .risk-level.low .multiplier { color: var(--primary); }
        .risk-level.medium .level-name, .risk-level.medium .multiplier { color: #FFC107; }
        .risk-level.high .level-name, .risk-level.high .multiplier { color: #F44336; }
        
        /* Notification Types */
        .notification-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
            gap: 20px;
            margin-top: 40px;
        }
        
        .notification-card {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);
            border-radius: 12px;
            padding: 24px;
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        .notification-icon {
            width: 50px;
            height: 50px;
            background: rgba(84, 64, 153, 0.2);
            border-radius: 50%;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            justify-content: center;
            margin: 0 auto 16px;
            font-size: 24px;
        }
        
        .notification-card h4 {
            color: #fff;
            font-size: 16px;
            margin-bottom: 8px;
        }
        
        .notification-card p {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 13px;
        }
        
        /* Screenshots Section */
        .screenshots-grid {
            display: grid;
            grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
            gap: 30px;
            margin-top: 40px;
        }
        
        .screenshot-card {
            background: #1a1a1a;
            border-radius: 16px;
            overflow: hidden;
            border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
        }
        
        .screenshot-header {
            background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--primary), var(--primary-dark));
            padding: 16px 20px;
            display: flex;
            align-items: center;
            gap: 12px;
        }
        
        .screenshot-header .step-badge {
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.2);
            padding: 4px 12px;
            border-radius: 20px;
            font-size: 12px;
        }
        
        .screenshot-header h4 {
            font-size: 16px;
        }
        
        .screenshot-body {
            padding: 30px;
            min-height: 200px;
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            justify-content: center;
            align-items: center;
            text-align: center;
        }
        
        .screenshot-body .icon {
            font-size: 48px;
            margin-bottom: 16px;
        }
        
        .screenshot-body p {
            color: #888;
            font-size: 14px;
        }
        
        /* Navigation */
        .slide-nav {
            position: fixed;
            left: 20px;
            top: 50%;
            transform: translateY(-50%);
            display: flex;
            flex-direction: column;
            gap: 12px;
            z-index: 100;
        }
        
        .nav-dot {
            width: 12px;
            height: 12px;
            border-radius: 50%;
            background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.3);
            cursor: pointer;
            transition: background 0.3s, transform 0.3s;
        }
        
        .nav-dot:hover, .nav-dot.active {
            background: var(--primary);
            transform: scale(1.3);
        }
        
        /* Footer */
        .slide-footer {
            text-align: center;
            padding: 40px;
            color: #666;
            font-size: 14px;
        }
        
        @media (max-width: 1024px) {
            .data-grid, .tech-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
            
            .process-flow {
                flex-direction: column;
                align-items: center;
                gap: 30px;
            }
            
            .process-flow::before {
                display: none;
            }
            
            .risk-factors {
                grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
            }
            
            .screenshots-grid {
                grid-template-columns: 1fr;
            }
        }
    </style>
</head>
<body>

    <nav class="slide-nav">

    <script>
        // Smooth scroll for navigation
        document.querySelectorAll('.nav-dot').forEach(dot => {
            dot.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
                target.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' });
            });
        });

        // Update active dot on scroll
        window.addEventListener('scroll', function() {
            const slides = document.querySelectorAll('.slide');
            const dots = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-dot');
            
            slides.forEach((slide, index) => {
                const rect = slide.getBoundingClientRect();
                if (rect.top >= -200 && rect.top < window.innerHeight / 2) {
                    dots.forEach(d => d.classList.remove('active'));
                    dots[index].classList.add('active');
                }
            });
        });
    </script>
</body>
```

```html
        // Smooth scroll for navigation
        document.querySelectorAll('.nav-dot').forEach(dot => {
            dot.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
                e.preventDefault();
                const target = document.querySelector(this.getAttribute('href'));
                target.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' });
            });
        });

        // Update active dot on scroll
        window.addEventListener('scroll', function() {
            const slides = document.querySelectorAll('.slide');
            const dots = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-dot');
            
            slides.forEach((slide, index) => {
                const rect = slide.getBoundingClientRect();
                if (rect.top >= -200 && rect.top < window.innerHeight / 2) {
                    dots.forEach(d => d.classList.remove('active'));
                    dots[index].classList.add('active');
                }
            });
        });
    </script>
```

Here's the `.htaccess` content you need to place in your `dist` directory to fix the 404 error on page refresh for your React SPA:

```plaintext
<IfModule mod_rewrite.c>
  RewriteEngine On
  RewriteBase /
  
  # If the requested resource doesn't exist as a file
  RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f
  # If the requested resource doesn't exist as a directory
  RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-d
  # Redirect all requests to index.html
  RewriteRule ^ index.html [QSA,L]
</IfModule>

# Set proper MIME types
<IfModule mod_mime.c>
  AddType application/javascript .js
  AddType text/css .css
  AddType image/svg+xml .svg
</IfModule>

# Enable compression
<IfModule mod_deflate.c>
  AddOutputFilterByType DEFLATE text/html text/plain text/css application/javascript application/json image/svg+xml
</IfModule>

# Cache static assets
<IfModule mod_expires.c>
  ExpiresActive On
  ExpiresByType image/png "access plus 1 month"
  ExpiresByType image/jpg "access plus 1 month"
  ExpiresByType image/jpeg "access plus 1 month"
  ExpiresByType image/svg+xml "access plus 1 month"
  ExpiresByType text/css "access plus 1 week"
  ExpiresByType application/javascript "access plus 1 week"
</IfModule>

```

```apache
<IfModule mod_rewrite.c>
  RewriteEngine On
  RewriteBase /
  
  # If the requested resource doesn't exist as a file
  RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f
  # If the requested resource doesn't exist as a directory
  RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-d
  # Redirect all requests to index.html
  RewriteRule ^ index.html [QSA,L]
</IfModule>
```

**What it does:**
- All requests to non-existing files/directories are redirected to `index.html`
- React Router then handles the routing client-side
- Actual static files (JS, CSS, images) are served normally

**On your server, run:**
```bash
cd /path/to/sfr.cco.sa
git pull origin main
npm run build
```

**Important:** The `.htaccess` is also in `public/` folder, so it will be automatically copied to `dist/` on every `npm run build`.

**If Apache's `mod_rewrite` is not enabled**, run on your server:
```bash
sudo a2enmod rewrite
sudo systemctl restart apache2
```

```javascriptreact
function Header() {
  const [mobileMenuOpen, setMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false)
  const location = useLocation()
  const navigate = useNavigate()
  const { t, language, toggleLanguage } = useLanguage()
  
  const userName = language === 'ar' ? 'أحمد' : 'Ahmed'

  const handleNavClick = () => {
    setMobileMenuOpen(false)
  }
  
  return (
    <header className="absher-header">
      <div className="header-container">
        {/* Right Side - Logos */}
        <div className="header-logos">
          <Link to="/home" className="logo-link">
            <AbsherLogo />
          </Link>
          <img 
            src="https://www.absher.sa/portal/landing/img/vission-logo.png" 
            alt="Vision 2030" 
            className="vision-logo"
          />
        </div>

        {/* Mobile Menu Toggle */}
        <button 
          className="mobile-menu-toggle"
          onClick={() => setMobileMenuOpen(!mobileMenuOpen)}
          aria-label="Toggle menu"
        >
          {mobileMenuOpen ? <CloseIcon /> : <MenuIcon />}
        </button>

        {/* Center - Navigation Buttons */}
        <div className={`header-nav-buttons ${mobileMenuOpen ? 'mobile-open' : ''}`}>
          {/* User Profile */}
          <div className="user-section">
            <div className="user-avatar">
              <span>{language === 'ar' ? 'أ' : 'A'}</span>
            </div>
            <span className="user-name">{userName}</span>
          </div>

          {/* Dashboard Button */}
          <Link 
            to="/home" 
            className={`nav-btn ${location.pathname === '/home' || location.pathname === '/' ? 'active' : ''}`}
            onClick={handleNavClick}
          >
            <DashboardIcon />
            <span>{language === 'ar' ? 'لوحة المعلومات' : 'Dashboard'}</span>
          </Link>

          {/* Edit User Info */}
          <button className="nav-btn" onClick={handleNavClick}>
            <UserEditIcon />
            <span>{language === 'ar' ? 'تعديل معلومات المستخدم' : 'Edit User Info'}</span>
          </button>

          {/* Service Guide */}
          <Link 
            to="/servicedemo" 
            className={`nav-btn ${location.pathname === '/servicedemo' ? 'active' : ''}`}
            onClick={handleNavClick}
          >
            <ServiceGuideIcon />
            <span>{language === 'ar' ? 'دليل الخدمات' : 'Service Guide'}</span>
          </Link>

          {/* Notifications */}
          <Link 
            to="/settings" 
            className={`nav-btn ${location.pathname === '/settings' ? 'active' : ''}`}
            onClick={handleNavClick}
          >
            <NotificationIcon />
            <span>{language === 'ar' ? 'الاشعارات' : 'Notifications'}</span>
          </Link>

          {/* Language Toggle */}
          <button className="nav-btn lang-btn" onClick={() => { toggleLanguage(); handleNavClick(); }}>
            <LanguageIcon />
            <span>{language === 'ar' ? 'English' : 'العربية'}</span>
          </button>

          {/* Logout */}
          <button className="nav-btn logout-btn" onClick={handleNavClick}>
            <LogoutIcon />
            <span>{language === 'ar' ? 'تسجيل الخروج' : 'Logout'}</span>
          </button>
        </div>

        {/* Left Side - MOI Logo */}
        <div className="header-moi-logo">
          <img 
            src="https://www.absher.sa/portal/landing/img/moi-logo.svg?MOD=AJPERES" 
            alt="MOI Logo"
            className="moi-logo"
          />
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Mobile menu overlay */}
      {mobileMenuOpen && (
        <div className="mobile-menu-overlay" onClick={() => setMobileMenuOpen(false)} />
      )}
    </header>
  )
}

export default Header
```

```css
  font-size: 32px;
  font-weight: 700;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 12px;
}

.page-header h1 svg {
  color: white;
}

.page-header p {
  color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
  font-size: 16px;
  margin-top: 12px;
}

/* ========================================
   STEPPER
   ======================================== */
.stepper {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0;
  padding: 24px 20px;
  background: white;
  border-radius: var(--border-radius-lg);
  margin: -30px auto 32px;
  max-width: 900px;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow);
  position: relative;
  z-index: 10;
}

.step {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  flex: 1;
  position: relative;
}

[dir="rtl"] .step:not(:last-child)::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  left: -50%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 2px;
  background-color: var(--color-border);
  z-index: -1;
}

[dir="ltr"] .step:not(:first-child)::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  right: 50%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 2px;
  background-color: var(--color-border);
  z-index: -1;
}

.step.completed:not(:last-child)::before,
.step.active:not(:last-child)::before {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
}

[dir="ltr"] .step.completed:not(:first-child)::before,
[dir="ltr"] .step.active:not(:first-child)::before {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
}

.step-number {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 14px;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  border: 2px solid var(--color-border);
  background: white;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  transition: all 0.3s;
}

.step.active .step-number {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.step.completed .step-number {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.step-label {
  font-size: 13px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  text-align: center;
}

.step.active .step-label,
.step.completed .step-label {
  color: var(--color-primary);
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* ========================================
   CARDS
   ======================================== */
.card {
  background: white;
  border-radius: var(--border-radius-lg);
  padding: 24px;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
}

.card-accent {
  background: var(--color-card-bg);
  border: 1px dashed var(--color-primary);
}

/* ========================================
   BUTTONS
   ======================================== */
.btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 8px;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 500;
  border: none;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}

.btn-primary {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-primary-dark);
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(0, 166, 81, 0.3);
}

.btn-outline {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
}

.btn-outline:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-background-alt);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
}

.btn-accent {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.btn-danger {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-error);
  color: var(--color-error);
}

.btn-danger:hover {
  background-color: #FEF2F2;
}

/* ========================================
   FORM ELEMENTS
   ======================================== */
.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.form-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 14px;
  transition: border-color 0.2s, box-shadow 0.2s;
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(0, 166, 81, 0.1);
}

/* ========================================
   GRID LAYOUT
   ======================================== */
.grid-2 {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 16px;
}

.grid-3 {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
  gap: 16px;
}

/* ========================================
   TEXT UTILITIES
   ======================================== */
.text-accent {
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.text-primary {
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.text-muted {
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.text-center {
  text-align: center;
}

.font-bold {
  font-weight: 700;
}

/* ========================================
   SPACING
   ======================================== */
.mt-4 { margin-top: 16px; }
.mt-6 { margin-top: 24px; }
.mt-8 { margin-top: 32px; }
.mb-4 { margin-bottom: 16px; }
.mb-6 { margin-bottom: 24px; }
.p-4 { padding: 16px; }
.p-6 { padding: 24px; }

/* ========================================
   LOADING SPINNER
   ======================================== */
.loading-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 48px;
  gap: 16px;
}

.spinner {
  width: 48px;
  height: 48px;
  border: 4px solid var(--color-border);
  border-top-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

/* ========================================
   ACCORDION
   ======================================== */
.accordion-item {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  margin-bottom: 12px;
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: border-color 0.2s;
}

.accordion-item:hover {
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
}

.accordion-header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 16px 20px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background-color 0.2s;
}

.accordion-header:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-background-alt);
}

.accordion-title {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 12px;
  font-size: 15px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.accordion-number {
  width: 28px;
  height: 28px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 2px solid var(--color-primary);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 13px;
  color: var(--color-primary);
  font-weight: 600;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.accordion-content {
  padding: 0 20px 20px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 1.8;
}

[dir="rtl"] .accordion-content {
  padding-right: 60px;
}

[dir="ltr"] .accordion-content {
  padding-left: 60px;
}

/* ========================================
   INFO CARD
   ======================================== */
.info-card {
  background: var(--color-card-bg);
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  padding: 20px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  gap: 16px;
}

.info-card-icon {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.info-card h3 {
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 4px;
}

.info-card p {
  font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
}

/* ========================================
   BADGE
   ======================================== */
.badge {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 4px;
  padding: 4px 12px;
  border-radius: 16px;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.badge-success {
  background-color: #D1FAE5;
  color: #059669;
}

.badge-warning {
  background-color: #FEF3C7;
  color: #D97706;
}

.badge-primary {
  background-color: var(--color-card-bg);
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

/* ========================================
   RESPONSIVE
   ======================================== */
@media (max-width: 1200px) {
  .header-nav-buttons {
    gap: 6px;
  }
  
  .nav-btn {
    padding: 8px 10px;
    min-height: 60px;
    font-size: 9px;
  }
  
  .header-nav-buttons > * {
    min-width: 70px;
    max-width: 90px;
  }
  
  .footer-links-container {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  }
}

@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .footer-container {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .footer-brand-column {
    flex-direction: row;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    width: 100%;
    gap: 24px;
  }
  
  .brand-logo-phone {
    padding: 16px 20px;
  }
  
  .footer-links-container {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .header-container {
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 16px;
  }
  
  .header-logos {
    order: 1;
  }
  
  .header-nav-buttons {
    order: 2;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: center;
    width: 100%;
  }
  
  .user-section {
    order: -1;
  }
  
  .nav-btn {
    flex: 0 0 auto;
  }
  
  .footer-links-container {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
    gap: 24px;
  }
  
  .footer-link-column {
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .social-icons-row,
  .accessibility-icons {
    justify-content: center;
  }
  
  .footer-copyright-v2 .footer-container {
    flex-direction: column;
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .stepper {
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 16px;
  }
  
  .step {
    flex: 0 0 auto;
    min-width: 100px;
  }
  
  .step::before {
    display: none !important;
  }
  
  .grid-2, .grid-3 {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
  
  .gov-logos {
    display: none;
  }
}
```

```javascriptreact
function Header() {
  const [mobileMenuOpen, setMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false)
  const location = useLocation()
  const navigate = useNavigate()
  const { t, language, toggleLanguage } = useLanguage()
  
  const userName = language === 'ar' ? 'أحمد' : 'Ahmed'

  const handleNavClick = () => {
    setMobileMenuOpen(false)
  }
  
  return (
    <header className="absher-header">
      <div className="header-container">
        {/* Right Side - Absher Logo (RTL) */}
        <div className="header-logos">
          <Link to="/home" className="logo-link">
            <AbsherLogo />
          </Link>
        </div>

        {/* Center - Language Toggle (Mobile) / Nav Buttons (Desktop) */}
        <button className="mobile-lang-toggle" onClick={toggleLanguage}>
          <GlobeIcon />
          <span>{language === 'ar' ? 'English' : 'العربية'}</span>
        </button>

        {/* Desktop Navigation */}
        <div className={`header-nav-buttons ${mobileMenuOpen ? 'mobile-open' : ''}`}>
          {/* User Profile */}
          <div className="user-section">
            <div className="user-avatar">
              <span>{language === 'ar' ? 'أ' : 'A'}</span>
            </div>
            <span className="user-name">{userName}</span>
          </div>

          {/* Dashboard Button */}
          <Link 
            to="/home" 
            className={`nav-btn ${location.pathname === '/home' || location.pathname === '/' ? 'active' : ''}`}
            onClick={handleNavClick}
          >
            <DashboardIcon />
            <span>{language === 'ar' ? 'لوحة المعلومات' : 'Dashboard'}</span>
          </Link>

          {/* Edit User Info */}
          <button className="nav-btn" onClick={handleNavClick}>
            <UserEditIcon />
            <span>{language === 'ar' ? 'تعديل معلومات المستخدم' : 'Edit User Info'}</span>
          </button>

          {/* Service Guide */}
          <Link 
            to="/servicedemo" 
            className={`nav-btn ${location.pathname === '/servicedemo' ? 'active' : ''}`}
            onClick={handleNavClick}
          >
            <ServiceGuideIcon />
            <span>{language === 'ar' ? 'دليل الخدمات' : 'Service Guide'}</span>
          </Link>

          {/* Notifications */}
          <Link 
            to="/settings" 
            className={`nav-btn ${location.pathname === '/settings' ? 'active' : ''}`}
            onClick={handleNavClick}
          >
            <NotificationIcon />
            <span>{language === 'ar' ? 'الاشعارات' : 'Notifications'}</span>
          </Link>

          {/* Language Toggle (Desktop) */}
          <button className="nav-btn lang-btn desktop-only" onClick={() => { toggleLanguage(); handleNavClick(); }}>
            <GlobeIcon />
            <span>{language === 'ar' ? 'English' : 'العربية'}</span>
          </button>

          {/* Logout */}
          <button className="nav-btn logout-btn" onClick={handleNavClick}>
            <LogoutIcon />
            <span>{language === 'ar' ? 'تسجيل الخروج' : 'Logout'}</span>
          </button>
        </div>

        {/* Left Side - MOI Logo + Vision 2030 */}
        <div className="header-gov-logos">
          <img 
            src="https://www.absher.sa/portal/landing/img/moi-logo.svg?MOD=AJPERES" 
            alt="MOI Logo"
            className="moi-logo"
          />
          <img 
            src="https://www.absher.sa/portal/landing/img/vission-logo.png" 
            alt="Vision 2030" 
            className="vision-logo"
          />
        </div>
      </div>

      {/* Mobile menu overlay */}
      {mobileMenuOpen && (
        <div className="mobile-menu-overlay" onClick={() => setMobileMenuOpen(false)} />
      )}
    </header>
  )
}

export default Header

```

```css
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 0;
  padding: 24px 20px;
  background: white;
  border-radius: var(--border-radius-lg);
  margin: -30px auto 32px;
  max-width: 900px;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow);
  position: relative;
  z-index: 10;
}

.step {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  flex: 1;
  position: relative;
}

[dir="rtl"] .step:not(:last-child)::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  left: -50%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 2px;
  background-color: var(--color-border);
  z-index: -1;
}

[dir="ltr"] .step:not(:first-child)::before {
  content: '';
  position: absolute;
  top: 20px;
  right: 50%;
  width: 100%;
  height: 2px;
  background-color: var(--color-border);
  z-index: -1;
}

.step.completed:not(:last-child)::before,
.step.active:not(:last-child)::before {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
}

[dir="ltr"] .step.completed:not(:first-child)::before,
[dir="ltr"] .step.active:not(:first-child)::before {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
}

.step-number {
  width: 40px;
  height: 40px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-weight: 600;
  font-size: 14px;
  margin-bottom: 8px;
  border: 2px solid var(--color-border);
  background: white;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  transition: all 0.3s;
}

.step.active .step-number {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.step.completed .step-number {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.step-label {
  font-size: 13px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  text-align: center;
}

.step.active .step-label,
.step.completed .step-label {
  color: var(--color-primary);
  font-weight: 500;
}

/* ========================================
   CARDS
   ======================================== */
.card {
  background: white;
  border-radius: var(--border-radius-lg);
  padding: 24px;
  box-shadow: var(--shadow-sm);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
}

.card-accent {
  background: var(--color-card-bg);
  border: 1px dashed var(--color-primary);
}

/* ========================================
   BUTTONS
   ======================================== */
.btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  gap: 8px;
  padding: 12px 24px;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 14px;
  font-weight: 500;
  border: none;
  transition: all 0.2s;
}

.btn-primary {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.btn-primary:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-primary-dark);
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 12px rgba(0, 166, 81, 0.3);
}

.btn-outline {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
}

.btn-outline:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-background-alt);
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
}

.btn-accent {
  background-color: var(--color-primary);
  color: white;
}

.btn-danger {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-error);
  color: var(--color-error);
}

.btn-danger:hover {
  background-color: #FEF2F2;
}

/* ========================================
   FORM ELEMENTS
   ======================================== */
.form-group {
  margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.form-label {
  display: block;
  font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  margin-bottom: 8px;
}

.form-input {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 12px 16px;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 14px;
  transition: border-color 0.2s, box-shadow 0.2s;
}

.form-input:focus {
  outline: none;
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(0, 166, 81, 0.1);
}

/* ========================================
   GRID LAYOUT
   ======================================== */
.grid-2 {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  gap: 16px;
}

.grid-3 {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr);
  gap: 16px;
}

/* ========================================
   TEXT UTILITIES
   ======================================== */
.text-accent {
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.text-primary {
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.text-muted {
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

.text-center {
  text-align: center;
}

.font-bold {
  font-weight: 700;
}

/* ========================================
   SPACING
   ======================================== */
.mt-4 { margin-top: 16px; }
.mt-6 { margin-top: 24px; }
.mt-8 { margin-top: 32px; }
.mb-4 { margin-bottom: 16px; }
.mb-6 { margin-bottom: 24px; }
.p-4 { padding: 16px; }
.p-6 { padding: 24px; }

/* ========================================
   LOADING SPINNER
   ======================================== */
.loading-container {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  padding: 48px;
  gap: 16px;
}

.spinner {
  width: 48px;
  height: 48px;
  border: 4px solid var(--color-border);
  border-top-color: var(--color-primary);
  border-radius: 50%;
  animation: spin 1s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes spin {
  to { transform: rotate(360deg); }
}

/* ========================================
   ACCORDION
   ======================================== */
.accordion-item {
  background: white;
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  margin-bottom: 12px;
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: border-color 0.2s;
}

.accordion-item:hover {
  border-color: var(--color-primary);
}

.accordion-header {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 16px 20px;
  cursor: pointer;
  transition: background-color 0.2s;
}

.accordion-header:hover {
  background-color: var(--color-background-alt);
}

.accordion-title {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 12px;
  font-size: 15px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.accordion-number {
  width: 28px;
  height: 28px;
  border-radius: 50%;
  border: 2px solid var(--color-primary);
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-size: 13px;
  color: var(--color-primary);
  font-weight: 600;
  flex-shrink: 0;
}

.accordion-content {
  padding: 0 20px 20px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  font-size: 14px;
  line-height: 1.8;
}

[dir="rtl"] .accordion-content {
  padding-right: 60px;
}

[dir="ltr"] .accordion-content {
  padding-left: 60px;
}

/* ========================================
   INFO CARD
   ======================================== */
.info-card {
  background: var(--color-card-bg);
  border-radius: var(--border-radius);
  padding: 20px;
  display: flex;
  align-items: flex-start;
  gap: 16px;
}

.info-card-icon {
  width: 24px;
  height: 24px;
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

.info-card h3 {
  font-size: 16px;
  font-weight: 600;
  margin-bottom: 4px;
}

.info-card p {
  font-size: 14px;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
}

/* ========================================
   BADGE
   ======================================== */
.badge {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 4px;
  padding: 4px 12px;
  border-radius: 16px;
  font-size: 12px;
  font-weight: 500;
}

.badge-success {
  background-color: #D1FAE5;
  color: #059669;
}

.badge-warning {
  background-color: #FEF3C7;
  color: #D97706;
}

.badge-primary {
  background-color: var(--color-card-bg);
  color: var(--color-primary);
}

/* ========================================
   RESPONSIVE
   ======================================== */
@media (max-width: 1200px) {
  .header-nav-buttons {
    gap: 6px;
  }
  
  .nav-btn {
    padding: 8px 10px;
    min-height: 60px;
    font-size: 9px;
  }
  
  .header-nav-buttons > * {
    min-width: 70px;
    max-width: 90px;
  }
  
  .footer-links-container {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
  }
}

@media (max-width: 1024px) {
  .footer-container {
    flex-direction: column;
  }
  
  .footer-brand-column {
    flex-direction: row;
    justify-content: center;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    width: 100%;
    gap: 24px;
  }
  
  .brand-logo-phone {
    padding: 16px 20px;
  }
  
  .footer-links-container {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr);
  }
}

@media (max-width: 768px) {
  .header-container {
    flex-direction: column;
    gap: 16px;
  }
  
  .header-logos {
    order: 1;
  }
  
  .header-nav-buttons {
    order: 2;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    justify-content: center;
    width: 100%;
  }
  
  .user-section {
    order: -1;
  }
  
  .nav-btn {
    flex: 0 0 auto;
  }
  
  .footer-links-container {
    grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);
    gap: 24px;
  }
  
  .footer-link-column {
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .social-icons-row,
  .accessibility-icons {
    justify-content: center;
  }
  
  .footer-copyright-v2 .footer-container {
    flex-direction: column;
    text-align: center;
  }
  
  .stepper {
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    gap: 16px;
  }
  
  .step {
    flex: 0 0 auto;
    min-width: 100px;
  }
  
  .step::before {
    display: none !important;
  }
  
  .grid-2, .grid-3 {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
  }
  
  .gov-logos {
    display: none;
  }
}
```

## التقنيات المستخدمة في أبشر سفر

### 1️⃣ تكامل API مع منصة أبشر
- **بوابة المطورين (Absher Developer Portal)**: التسجيل كمزود خدمة معتمد من وزارة الداخلية
- **بروتوكول المصادقة**: OAuth 2.0 مع النفاذ الوطني الموحد (IAM)
- **نقاط الاتصال المطلوبة**:
  - `GET /api/v1/citizen/travel-ban-status` - التحقق من حظر السفر
  - `POST /api/v1/permits/temporary-travel` - إصدار تصريح مؤقت
  - `GET /api/v1/permits/{id}/verify` - التحقق من صلاحية التصريح
  - `POST /api/v1/notifications/send` - إرسال الإشعارات

### 2️⃣ تكامل مع منصة ناجز (وزارة العدل)
- **API ناجز للمديونيات**: جلب تفاصيل الديون والأحكام القضائية
- **نظام الإشعارات القضائية**: إخطار الدائنين بطلبات السفر
- **التحقق من حالة القضايا**: ربط آني مع السجلات القضائية

### 3️⃣ محرك السداد اليومي التلقائي
- **تكامل مع نظام سداد**: للمدفوعات الحكومية
- **شبكة مدى**: للخصم المباشر من الحسابات البنكية
- **جدولة المهام (Cron Jobs)**: خصم تلقائي يومي الساعة 00:00
- **نظام الإشعارات**: تنبيه فوري عند نجاح/فشل الخصم

### 4️⃣ البنية التحتية الأمنية
- **تشفير البيانات**: AES-256 للبيانات الحساسة
- **نقل البيانات**: TLS 1.3 لجميع الاتصالات
- **الامتثال**: معايير الهيئة الوطنية للأمن السيبراني (NCA)
- **الاستضافة**: سحابة حكومية داخل المملكة (AWS Saudi / STC Cloud)

### 5️⃣ خوارزمية تقييم المخاطر
- **نموذج تعلم آلي**: لتقييم احتمالية الالتزام بالعودة
- **عوامل التقييم**: نسبة المديونية، سجل السداد، تاريخ السفر، قوة الضامن
- **معاملات الضمان الديناميكية**: 1.2x - 2.0x حسب مستوى المخاطر

### 6️⃣ نظام الإشعارات الذكية
- **قنوات متعددة**: SMS، إشعارات التطبيق، البريد الإلكتروني
- **إشعارات آنية**: موافقات، تحديثات السداد، تذكيرات العودة
- **تكامل مع أبشر**: إشعارات داخل تطبيق أبشر الرسمي

### 7️⃣ البنية التقنية
| الطبقة | التقنية |
|--------|---------|
| الواجهة الأمامية | React.js + Vite (متوافق مع تصميم أبشر) |
| الخدمات الخلفية | Node.js/Express أو Java Spring Boot |
| قاعدة البيانات | PostgreSQL + Redis للتخزين المؤقت |
| التكاملات | REST APIs + Message Queues (RabbitMQ) |

---

### ✅ المتطلبات للتطبيق الفعلي:
1. اعتماد من **وزارة الداخلية** للتكامل مع أبشر
2. اعتماد من **وزارة العدل** للتكامل مع ناجز
3. ترخيص من **البنك المركزي السعودي** للمعاملات المالية
4. شهادة **الامتثال للأمن السيبراني** من NCA

## التقنيات المستخدمة (ملخص)

| التقنية | الوصف |
|---------|-------|
| **تكامل أبشر API** | OAuth 2.0 + النفاذ الوطني الموحد للتحقق من الهوية وحظر السفر |
| **تكامل ناجز API** | جلب بيانات المديونيات وإشعار الدائنين |
| **محرك السداد** | سداد + مدى للخصم اليومي التلقائي |
| **الأمان** | تشفير AES-256 + TLS 1.3 + امتثال NCA |
| **الاستضافة** | سحابة حكومية داخل المملكة |
| **خوارزمية المخاطر** | تقييم ذكي لاحتمالية الالتزام بالعودة |
| **الإشعارات** | SMS + إشعارات أبشر + البريد الإلكتروني |

**الاعتمادات المطلوبة:**
- وزارة الداخلية (أبشر)
- وزارة العدل (ناجز)
- البنك المركزي (المدفوعات)
- هيئة الأمن السيبراني (NCA)
